title: EGCE/genomeassembler pipeline - params.input schema
description: Schema for the file provided with params.input

name.errorMessage: Assembly name must be provided and cannot contain spaces

technology.description: The technology used for sequencing: nanopore / pacbio
technology.errorMessage: Technology must be provided and must be 'nanopore' or 'pacbio'

genome_size.errorMessage: Genome size must be provided and must contain digits only

reads.description: Path to raw long reads (compressed) for draft assembly. File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file.
reads.errorMessage: File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file. File name cannot contain spaces.

draft_assembly.help_text: You can provide an assembly and skip the assembly step.

polish_draft_assembly.errorMessage: Whether to polish the draft assembly

haplotype_1_reads.description: Path to long reads (compressed) for assembly of haplotig 1. File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file.
haplotype_1_reads.errorMessage: File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file. File name cannot contain spaces.

haplotype_2_reads.description: Path to long reads (compressed) for assembly of haplotig 2. File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file.
haplotype_2_reads.errorMessage: File must be a compressed Fastq (preferred) / Fasta file. File name cannot contain spaces.

haplotig_1.description: Path to draft assembly fasta file (compressed) corresponding to haplotig 1.
haplotig_1.help_text: You can provide an assembly and skip the assembly step.

haplotig_2.description: Path to draft assembly fasta file (compressed) corresponding to haplotig 1.
haplotig_2.help_text: You can provide an assembly and skip the assembly step.

polish_haplotigs.errorMessage: Whether to polish the haplotig draft assemblies

clean_haplotigs.errorMessage: Whether to clean (purge duplicates) the haplotig assemblies

hic_fastq_1.description: Path to Fastq file (compressed) for Hi-C reads (R1).
hic_fastq_1.errorMessage: FastQ file for Hi-C reads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'

hic_fastq_2.description: Path to Fastq file (compressed) for Hi-C reads (R2).
hic_fastq_2.errorMessage: FastQ file for Hi-C reads cannot contain spaces and must have extension '.fq.gz' or '.fastq.gz'
